name: Skate The Strip
description:
Lets do this!!!
Stickman skater is on the strip and ready to roll.
Three Game modes to play.
Backflip
Manual
Nose Manual

Backflip- cruise down the strip hitting the ramps and backflipping through the halfpipes.
Tap/hold and release at the right moment to enter or land with out crashing.
Perfect landings help keep up your'e speed to make it through the strip. Reach the end and become a backflip legend!!!

Manual- Tap to lean back and raise the front of the board. keep tapping and releasing, and don't let the front wheels touch the ground. Lets see how far you can go.

Nose Manual- same as a Manual but a lot trickier, don't let the back wheels touch the ground.
Have fun and lets see if you can go the distance.

Features- One tap game play
-GameCentre leaderboard to challenge the world and your friends.
